text: Women's writing may refer to the general study of women writers or women's literature as a genre in general, or in particular languages: * Women's writing in English * Écriture féminine * List of women writers * List of women rhetoricians * List of early-modern women playwrights (UK) * List of early- modern women poets (UK) * Women science fiction authors * List of biographical dictionaries of women writers * List of organizations for women writers * Women's page, a newspaper section that covered topics assumed to be of interest to women * Chick lit ==See also== *Women's script (disambiguation)
title: Women's writing
